Class PlayerManager.Player

java.lang.Object
com.game.utils.PlayerManager.Player
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Enclosing class:
PlayerManager
public static class PlayerManager.Player extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a player profile with personal information and game statistics.
See Also:

    • Player

      public Player(String nom, String prenom, String avatar)
      Constructs a Player instance.
      Parameters:
      nom - last name of the player
      prenom - first name of the player
      avatar - avatar identifier or filename
